nodes.text: After escaping her prison on Koba, Jedi Padawan Yaddle returned to Coruscant after many years of captivity and was promoted immediately to the rank of Jedi Master on the Jedi High Council. Master Yaddle then constructed an orange-bladed lightsaber which she wielded until her death on Mawan in 26 BBY.

After constructing her orange bladed lightsaber, Master Yaddle would rarely need to use her weapon, as she would remain on Coruscant in the Jedi Temple. In some cases, she would use it, like in 33 BBY on a mission to the planet of Asmeru with fellow Jedi Qui-Gon Jinn and his Padawan Obi-Wan Kenobi, Ki-Adi-Mundi, Saesee Tiin, Depa Billaba and Vergere. She used her lightsaber against the Nebula Front terrorists, emerging victorious.

In 32 BBY, Yaddle traveled to Malastare with fellow Council members Mace Windu, Plo Koon, Ki-Adi-Mundi, Even Piell and Adi Gallia. Hutar Zash would betray his friend Even Piell and seek to appease the Red Iaro. Master Yaddle and her comrades bravely fought against the Red Iaro members, emerging victorious.

Master Yaddle then participated on a mission to Mawan, along with Grand Master Yoda, Obi-Wan Kenobi and his apprentice Anakin Skywalker. There, they confronted Granta Omega, the son of Qui-Gon Jinn's former apprentice Xanatos. Yaddle sacrificed herself to save the people of Mawan.
